SELECT
(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info) AS SVC_ALL ,(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info WHERE CONTRACT_EDT >= CURDATE()) AS SVC_NOW ,(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info WHERE CONTRACT_EDT < CURDATE()) AS SVC_END
FROM DUAL

SELECT COMPANY_ID,BR_NUMBER,COMPANY_NAME ,RP_NAME,BR_ADDRESS,BILLER_PHONE,BILLER_EMAIL,RP_PHONE ,MANAGER_ID,MANAGER_NAME,MANAGER_EMAIL,MANAGER_DEPT ,MANAGER_RANK,MANAGER_PHONE,COMPANY_ADDRESS ,MSP_NHN,MSP_NAVER,MSP_KT,MSP_AWS,MSP_RESALE ,IAAS_NHN,IAAS_KT,IAAS_NAVER,IAAS_AWS ,SDR_NHN,SDR_NAVER,SDR_KT ,MSPB_LITE,MSPB_STANDARD,MSPB_PREMIUM ,CONTRACT_STDT,CONTRACT_EDT ,BILL_DT,BILL_RFDT,TAX_DT ,RES_SALES,RES_MANAGER,CONTRACT ,EVIDENCE,COM_DIV,ENROLL_ID,ENROLL_NAME ,CASE WHEN CONTRACT_EDT >= CURDATE() THEN '서비스중' ELSE '서비스종료' END AS SVC_YN
,(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info)AS SVC_ALL ,(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info WHERE CONTRACT_EDT >= CURDATE())AS SVC_NOW ,(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info WHERE CONTRACT_EDT < CURDATE())AS SVC_END
FROM COMPANY_INFO WHERE 1=1
and COMPANY_ID=#{COMPANY_ID}
AND CONTRACT_EDT >= CURDATE()
AND CONTRACT_EDT < CURDATE()
AND contract_stdt >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{searchRadio2} MONTH
AND CONTRACT_STDT >= #{sDate} AND CONTRACT_STDT <= #{eDate}
AND COMPANY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND MANAGER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND RP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
ORDER BY CONTRACT_STDT DESC

SELECT COMPANY_ID,BR_NUMBER,COMPANY_NAME ,RP_NAME,BR_ADDRESS,BILLER_PHONE,BILLER_EMAIL,RP_PHONE ,MANAGER_ID,MANAGER_NAME,MANAGER_EMAIL,MANAGER_DEPT ,MANAGER_RANK,MANAGER_PHONE,COMPANY_ADDRESS ,MSP_NHN,MSP_NAVER,MSP_KT,MSP_AWS,MSP_RESALE ,IAAS_NHN,IAAS_KT,IAAS_NAVER,IAAS_AWS ,SDR_NHN,SDR_NAVER,SDR_KT ,MSPB_LITE,MSPB_STANDARD,MSPB_PREMIUM ,CONTRACT_STDT,CONTRACT_EDT ,BILL_DT,BILL_RFDT,TAX_DT ,RES_SALES,RES_MANAGER,CONTRACT ,EVIDENCE,COM_DIV,ENROLL_ID,ENROLL_NAME ,CASE WHEN CONTRACT_EDT >= CURDATE() THEN '서비스중' ELSE '서비스종료' END AS SVC_YN
,(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info)AS SVC_ALL ,(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info WHERE CONTRACT_EDT >= CURDATE())AS SVC_NOW ,(SELECT COUNT(COMPANY_ID) FROM company_info WHERE CONTRACT_EDT < CURDATE())AS SVC_END
FROM COMPANY_INFO WHERE 1=1
and COMPANY_ID=#{COMPANY_ID}
AND A.COMPANY_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND A.COMPANY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

SELECT LPAD(A.COMPANY_ID+1,4,'0') FROM ( SELECT COMPANY_ID FROM COMPANY_INFO ORDER BY COMPANY_ID DESC LIMIT 1 )A
